answers.answer: Everyone gains differently, but that sounds pretty normal to me. =) I'm 29 weeks and gained 19 pounds so far, but it's my second baby and I'm already a little over weight. I gained 33 pounds with my first baby. As long as your Dr doesn't say anything about it then I'm sure you're alright =)
I agree with anm. As long as your doctor says your baby is fine, than that's all that matters. :)

I'm 22w+5 and I've gained 24lbs .. Dr says baby is fine but I need to slow down so that my blood pressure doesnt go up and I get preeclampsia .. he scared the mess outta me so ill be slowing down for sure lol .. ur Dr will definitely let you know if your weight is truly excessive so I wouldn't worry
I'm 22 weeks and I've only gained 5.3 lbs .. my Dr hasn't said anything so as long as your Dr hasn't said anything you should be fine :)

question: I've gained 19 pounds and I'm going on 23 weeks is that to much?
title: weight fain
